imgHeaders: importClass(Packages.com.reader.comic.utils.StringUtils);function getHeader(){return Headers.of("Referer","http://m.dm5.com/")}function getHeader2(url){var cid="m".concat(StringUtils.match("cid=(\d+)",url,1));return Headers.of("Referer","http://m.dm5.com/".concat(cid))}function getHeader3(){var cid="";if(list!=null){cid=list.get(0).getChapter()}return Headers.of("Referer","http://m.dm5.com/".concat(cid))};
